Square GKP Qubit

Contents

  • Square GKP Qubit
  • Rectangular GKP Qubit
  • Hexagonal GKP Qubit
%load_ext autoreload
%autoreload 2

from bosonic_jax import GKPQubit,  HexagonalGKPQubit, SquareGKPQubit, RectangularGKPQubit, BosonicRegister, BosonicCircuit, execute

Square GKP Qubit#

qubit = SquareGKPQubit(params={"N":300, "delta": 0.1}) # GKPQubit == SquareGKPQubit
breg = BosonicRegister([qubit])
bcirc = BosonicCircuit(breg)
qubit.plot_code_states()

qubit = SquareGKPQubit(params={"N":200}) # GKPQubit == SquareGKPQubit
breg = BosonicRegister([qubit])
bcirc = BosonicCircuit(breg)
qubit.plot_code_states()

qubit.plot_code_states(qp_type="qfunc")

bcirc.plot(0) # plot initial state

# set up circuit
bcirc.reset()
bcirc.x(0)

results = execute(bcirc, "unitary_jax")
results.plot(bcirc,0)

Rectangular GKP Qubit#

qubit = RectangularGKPQubit(params={"N":200})
breg = BosonicRegister([qubit])
bcirc = BosonicCircuit(breg)
qubit.plot_code_states()

bcirc.plot(0) # plot initial state

# set up circuit
bcirc.reset()
bcirc.x(0)

results = execute(bcirc, "unitary_jax")
results.plot(bcirc,0)

Hexagonal GKP Qubit#

qubit = HexagonalGKPQubit(params={"N":200})
breg = BosonicRegister([qubit])
bcirc = BosonicCircuit(breg)
qubit.plot_code_states()

bcirc.plot(0) # plot initial state

# set up circuit
bcirc.reset()
bcirc.x(0)

%timeit results = execute(bcirc, "unitary_jax")

3.29 µs ± 25.2 ns per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 7 runs, 100,000 loops each)

results.plot(bcirc,0)
